subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which city is the capital of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान की राजधानी के लिए किस शहर की जानकारी चाहिए।
explanation_en:
Jaipur is the capital of Rajasthan, a city known as the Pink City.
English: Jaipur is the capital of Rajasthan, a city known as the Pink City.
Hindi: जयपुर राजस्थान की राजधानी है, एक परंत (पंक) के नामेंगें।
explanation_hi: जयपुर राजस्थान की राजधानी है, एक परंत (पंक) के नामेंगें।
explanation_en:
Jaipur is the capital of Rajasthan, known as the Pink City due to the color of its buildings.
English: Jaipur is the capital of Rajasthan, famously known as the Pink City because of the color of its buildings.
explanation_hi: जयपुर राजस्थान की राजधानी है, उसके बिल्लाई के नामेंगेंगें।
